summary: The whole family is reunited when Sofia comes back for her father's funeral. Quickly, inner problems are revealed.
cast: Morjana Alaoui|Nadine Labaki|Hiam Abbass|Lubna Azabal|Adel Bencherif|Omar Sharif|Raouia|Assia Bentria|Lyès Salem|Hassan El Ganouni|Jad Mhidi Senhaji|Hadi Alaoui|Mohamed Ayad|Fatim-Zahra Lahouitar|Abdelkader Dourkan|Douaa El Fare|Tissnim Hamid|Hicham Ibrahimi|Mourad Zaoui|Khalid Bekkouri|Haj Abdeslam Ben Abdellah|Noam Chaoudri|Abdeslam Bouchouana|Sanaa Elhamiani|Abdelhaq Belmhadj|Khadija Elmaimouni|Robert Burns|Lina Hajjoubi|Noor Esskali|Bouchra Chioua|Zakaria Belkiri|Zohra Aïch|Narrimane Benaïssa|Fahd Ghellab|Bouchaib Moudden|Abdelhakim Chioua|Driss Jail|Siham Rida|Younes Mchiche|Sean Gullette|Emanuela Postacchini
title: Rock the Casbah
